```{r, message = FALSE}
# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
# Read in data
aqi_ozone <- read_csv(here("Project Data", "2021", "Final Data", "aqi_ozone.csv"))
```

```{r}
aqi_ozone %>%
  count(State)
```


```{r}
aqi_ozone %>%
  mutate(Month = factor(month(Date))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Month, y = AQI)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
  
```

```{r}
cor(aqi_ozone %>% pull(AQI), aqi_ozone %>% pull(ozone))
```
```{r}
aqi_ozone %>% ggplot(aes(x = ozone, y = AQI)) + geom_point()
```

```{r}
aqi_ozone %>% ggplot(aes(x = humid)) + geom_histogram()
```
